short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show and toggle day and night background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted your computer to understand and show you exactly what is the current state outside?
With Day and Night extension your new tab extension will show you if you are currently searching during the day, or during the night. And it is changeable!!
Experience top of the art css work in this new extension.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Day & Night Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing.
